translation: Huayan zongzhang shou and yinming lu

source_sentence: 東大寺圓超大法師奉聖王勅錄上
translation: Record of the Master Enzai of Tōdaiji Temple According to the Ima-mai of the Sacred King
It's secretly because Buddhism has flourished.
There's a reason for it here.
It's the realm of the Western Heavens.

source_sentence: 釋迦能仁駕鹿苑而疏其源。
translation: Śākyamuni drove to the Deer Preserve and uncovered its source.
In the Eastern Han dynasty.

source_sentence: 孝明皇帝夢金人而尋其蹤。
translation: Emperor Xiaoming dreamed of the Jin Ren and searched for his whereabouts.
Strange images from our country came to the shore.
The teaching of subtle language was heard to be empty.

source_sentence: 磯城嶋金剌宮御宇欽明天皇十三年佛法始傳矣。
translation: It was in the thirteenth year of Emperor Kammyeong's reign that the Shāsôgama Jinrāgū Yōyu began to transmit the Buddhist teachings.
It was followed by the fourteenth year of Enishi.
It took 350,533 years.
During that time, what was transmitted...
The Dharma treasury was exhausted.
The teaching was divided into an exhaustive school.
The sūtras and treatises were written and discussed by public and private alike.
The sūtras and commentaries were kept secret but left to the minds of men.
Some secrets aren't transmitted, and some are scattered but not written.
Sometimes they are dispersed and not written.
The doctrinal chapters and commentaries gradually became profane.

source_sentence: 白馬教法無由釋焉伏惟禪定皇帝。
translation: There's no way to explain the teaching of the White Horse; however, I respectfully submit that the emperor of meditation.
Before the five hundred buddhas.
He was personally entrusted with his mandate.
He had the authority to manifest the king's body in the whole world.
He revered the noble teaching far beyond the five heavens.
He has promoted the manifest and the esoteric nearly as far as AURORA.
I've been instructed by the emperor to write a memorial for the transmission of the scriptures.

source_sentence: 使六宗碩學進各宗之錄。
translation: It caused the six schools of great learning to advance to the records of each school.
Yuanchao Gou accompanied the finalists in the Huayan school.
I would like to present a record of my own school and of the Buddhist teachings.
We must rely on the correct instructions of later philosophers.

source_sentence: 甲戌之歲四月八日謹序。
translation: This is the preface of the eighth day of the fourth month in the year Kixu.

source_sentence: 唯識比量遣偽興真章一卷(行賀述)正理註釋一卷(崇俊述)廣百論疏十卷(文備述)廣百論撮要一卷(元曉述)如實論疏一卷(真諦三藏述)基疏記三卷(邕法師述)基疏記三卷(智周述)基疏記三卷(清素述)基疏記三卷(頴法師述)基疏記三卷(獻法師述)基疏記三卷(名有鈔無作名)基疏略記一卷(智周述)基疏後記三卷(智周述)纂要記一卷(如理述)纂要記一卷(首法師述)纂要記一卷(周法師述)纂要記一卷(清法師述)纂要記一卷(林法師述)纂要記一卷(憲法師述)義斷記一卷(清法師述)義斷記一卷(憲法師述)義斷記一卷(林法師述)義斷記一卷(周法師述)義斷記一卷(擇隣述)已上唐書。
translation: Weishilun biannu xiancheng xingzhen zhang 1 vol.

source_sentence: 明燈鈔十二卷(善珠僧正述)

source_sentence: 已上百八十二部七百八十四卷。
translation: The above is a collection of seven hundred and eighty-four volumes in one of the one hundred and eighty-two divisions.
